intro: Hemigraphis undulata, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often used in ornamental horticulture for its attractive foliage. Hemigraphis undulata is also valued for its ability to purify indoor air and its adaptability to various growing conditions.
